lines.text: A man's not capable of taking care of a baby according to the courts. He can build bridges, he can fly around the world, he can be president and run the whole United States, but taking care of a child is too much for him! For that you've got to be a woman. Any woman!
If the poor can get any satisfaction out of being proud, well, why not? It costs nothing.
This is a maternity hospital, brother. If they had nine watches, they wouldn't tell a father what time it was.
Leave it with me and rest assured I will handle it with all the tact and delicacy of a crooked diplomat.
Everybody's a stranger to a newborn baby. Don't you understand? She doesn't know anybody.
As for my character. I believe I behave responsibly. I'm not overly susceptible to girls.
I think you got exactly what you deserved for being a shameless, unmitigated scoundrel.
I suppose so. But it was a bitter disappointment just the same.

[inside the Church]
Where's the sucker?
Oh, John! I do wish you wouldn't refer to him in that way! Supposing someone heard. What would they think?

[unfazed]
Where's the sucker?

[dreamily]
Her eyes were like burned, charred embers in a field of snow.
Big face, eh?

[discussing his wife]
I used to dream of outliving her. Just sit it out, as it were. But along came Madge. And then her sister. And now that odious child.

[on hearing her new son-in-law's name]
Casanova!
Is this an Italian fellow?
A historical character, Father.
[pause]
Rather fast.
To me a liar is lower than a cigarette fiend.
I would as soon as associate with a time bomb!
Why would a New York girl have to go to Chicago to have a baby?
Shoot him! Shoot him before he gets too far!
I cahn't, sir. It isn't loaded.

[after blithly telling his daughter the groom isn't coming]
What do you all say we catch a movie tonight?
Why don't you get some goldfish? No trouble at all and they die overnight!
That's the way they say they make jockeys. Poor a little gin in their wheaties.
It is my baby, isn't it?
Technically, yes.
What's the idea of giving my technical baby away?
Is this the same fellow that was marrying all the rest of them?
He's in a nuptial rut.
